ptolemy.homer.widgets

Class GlassPaneWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.api.visual.widget.Widget
      • ptolemy.homer.widgets.NamedObjectWidget
        • ptolemy.homer.widgets.GlassPaneWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.accessibility.Accessible, NamedObjectWidgetInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttributeStyleWidget, PortablePlaceableWidget

    public class GlassPaneWidget
extends NamedObjectWidget
    Glasspane covers underlying awt component and blocks any events from propagating to them. Instead, it forward all events it receives to the scene's view. This is done to ensure that all widget actions work as intended. This class is not intended to be used as is but rather needs to be extended for widgets where glasspane is required.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Anar Huseynov
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (ahuseyno)

    • Method Detail

      • setGlassPaneSize

        public void setGlassPaneSize(java.awt.Dimension dimension)
        Set the dimension of the glass pane and components its covering. This method must be called once to set sizes for all components. After that the widget would automatically resize.
        Parameters:
        dimension - the dimension of the glasspane.
